member.summary: Term: Search term (e.g. "food", "restaurants"). If term isnâ€™t included we search everything.

member.summary: Limit: Number of business results to return

member.summary: Offset: Offset the list of returned business results by this amount

member.name: P:Yelp.ServiceWrapper.Requests.SearchRequest.RadiusFilter
member.summary: RadiusFilter: Search radius in meters. If the value is too large, a AREA_TOO_LARGE error may be returned. The max value is 40000 meters (25 miles).
